LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartSmall.label: animal heart (small)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartSmall.description:
Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneySmall.label: animal kidney (small)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneySmall.description:
Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverSmall.label: animal liver (small)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverSmall.description:
Plays an important role in metabolism.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungSmall.label: animal lung (small)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungSmall.description:
Essential part of the respiratory system.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperSmall.label: animal painstopper (small)
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperSmall.description:
This brain implant will make an animal not feel pain.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmSmall.label: bionic animal arm (small)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmSmall.description:
One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarSmall.label: bionic animal ear (small)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarSmall.description:
An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeSmall.label: bionic animal eye (small)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeSmall.description:
Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace a natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegSmall.label: bionic animal leg (small)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegSmall.description:
Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmSmall.label: prosthetic animal arm (small)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmSmall.descripti:
Simple but durable arm prosthesis.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegSmall.label: prosthetic animal leg (small)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegSmall.descripti:
Simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.3 or greater, but less than 0.7.
